titles.title: NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act of 2020
NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act of 2020
A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to require the submission of certain reports, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
NEPA Data Transparency and Accountability Act of 2020
This bill requires federal agencies to annually report on their environmental review activities as required by the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.
